body.title: Project Description
body.text:
My Image Compressor was developed during the 2nd year of Epitech. The goal was to create an image compressor using the k-means clustering algorithm.

In our case, the program receives a list of pixels and a number K that corresponds to the final number of colors.
The lower the K, the more the image is compressed.

By grouping each pixel in the most appropriate cluster based on color and position, the image is modified while maintaining the best possible quality.

body.title: Program Result
body.text:
The expected format of our project's result was:

--
Color (R,G,B) of a cluster
-
List of positions (x,y) and colors (R,G,B) of a pixel of the cluster
--
Repetition of format according to the number of color K requested
